newsitem.title: USA: U.S. blue chips higher, hopeful for Q2 earnings.
newsitem.headline: U.S. blue chips higher, hopeful for Q2 earnings.

text.p: The Dow industrials steadied at higher levels in afternoon trading on Tuesday, making up ground lost yesterday, as the equities market took an optimistic view towards the upcoming earnings reporting period.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 68 points, or 0.86 percent, to 7925. It extended early gains as the long bond pushed to positive ground, gaining 3/32 to yield 6.57 percent.
The Nasdaq composite rose around nine points to 1480, as stocks like Intel Corp and Microsoft Corp moved higher in active trade.
